biography: Irwin Was A Generous Actor, He Reinvented The Horror Genre With His Acting Skills, He Got His Start With Minor Role Characters In The 70's & 80's In Low & Big Budget Films. He Has Not Only Claimed A Great Ammount Of Film Work, But He Has Starred With Entertaining Actors & Actresses Such As John Patrick Jordan, Rey Mysterio Sr. & Leyla Milani. He Continued Acting Up Til His Death Occured. His Acting Life Will Live In Fans Everywhere.
name: Irwin Keyes
place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
